name: Beat Extreme: Rhythm Tap Music
description:
Beat Extreme : New Dimension Rhythm Game - The awesome Music Game.

It's an absolutely addictive game with the most thrilling and exciting rhythm! You never wanna miss it!.
You can enjoy this awesome rhythm game. Hit the notes at the correct time to get the highest score then share your score with your friends.
2019 latest music arcade game, which tests your music rhythm and hand speed. Challenge your friends and see who has the last laugh!
A new music rhythm game. Continuously update various types of songs every week.
Pop,Anime, Classic, K-Pop,EDM, Rock, Trap, Hiphop, and more...
Many types of music with many instruments such as: Piano, Grand Piano, Tube Organ, Harpsichord, Accordion, Electric Guitar, Harp, Cello Pizzicato, Guzheng, Guitar Guitar, Plucked String, Music Box, Sitar, Xylophone, Harp, Vibes, Clarinet, Ukulele, Brass, Tabbla, Dizi, Banjo, Flute, Saxophone, Cellto, Hamonica, Trumpet, violin, Panpipe, Maracas, Tuba, Dulcimer, Kalimba, EMD, …
You can always find your favorite song and play it in this music world.

Download now and experience a brand new music game experience!
